perturbation.original_text:
This Co-Branding Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of  March
___, 1999 (the "Effective Date") by and between theglobe.com, Inc., with its
principal place of business at 31 West 21st Street, New York, NY  10010
("theglobe"), and The Boxlot Company, with its principal place of business at
12626 High Bluff Drive, Suite 370, San Diego, CA  92130 ("Boxlot").
perturbation.changed_text:
This Co-Branding Agreement (the "Contract") is entered into as of  March
___, 1999 (the "Commencement Date") by and between theglobe.com, Inc., with its
principal place of business at 31 West 21st Street, New York, NY  10010
("theglobe"), and The Boxlot Company, with its principal place of business at
12626 High Bluff Drive, Suite 370, San Diego, CA  92130 ("Boxlot").
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Agreement' to 'Contract' and 'Effective Date' to 'Commencement Date' introduces different terminology for the same concepts, potentially leading to confusion about which term is legally binding and which date marks the beginning of obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
8.   TERM AND TERMINATION.
     8.1  Term.  This Agreement will become effective on the Effective Date and
will continue in effect for 2 years following the Launch Date.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.   TERM AND TERMINATION.
     8.1  Term.  This Agreement will become effective on the Commencement Date and
will remain valid for a period of 36 months from the Activation Date.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'in effect for 2 years following the Launch Date' to 'remain valid for a period of 36 months from the Activation Date' introduces different terminology for the same concepts, potentially leading to confusion about which term is legally binding and which date marks the beginning of obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
12.9  Entire Agreement; Waiver.  This Agreement sets forth the entire
understanding and agreement of the parties, and supersedes any and all oral or
written agreements or understandings between the parties, as to the subject
matter of the Agreement.  This Agreement may be changed only by a writing signed
by both parties.
perturbation.changed_text:
12.9  Entire Understanding; Waiver.  This Contract sets forth the entire
understanding and deal of the parties, and supersedes any and all oral or
written deals or understandings between the parties, as to the subject
matter of the arrangement.  This Contract may be altered only by a writing signed
by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: Changing multiple terms within the 'Entire Agreement' clause - 'Agreement' to 'Contract', 'understanding and agreement' to 'understanding and deal', 'agreements or understandings' to 'deals or understandings', and 'subject matter of the Agreement' to 'subject matter of the arrangement'- creates significant ambiguity and legal uncertainty. It's unclear if all these terms are intended to be synonymous or if they create different obligations.
